snippet: With 15 days left in office, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg will be crisscrossing New York City’s five boroughs to highlight his administration’s successes.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg is planning a five-borough farewell tour of New York City; with 15 days left in office, he plans to spend time highlighting his administration’s successes, and describing positive changes made since he took office in 2002.
lead_paragraph: With 15 days left in office, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg will be crisscrossing New York City’s five boroughs to highlight his administration’s successes.

headline.main: Bloomberg Focuses on His Legacy in Farewell Tour Across the City
headline.print_headline: Mayor Focuses On His Legacy In Farewell Tour Across the City
